page.title: 02FOOD WE LIKE
page.content:
For lunch at Wilmcote School 50 children bring{sandwiches}& 20 have {school dinners.}The dinners are cooked in our kitchen at the moment but when the cook retires at the end of July 1985 our food will be brought from a school in Stratford. We did a{"favourite food"}survey in school and the favourite food was fish & chips. Favourite{puddings}were ice-cream & apple crumble. Favourite{breakfasts}were Rice crispies & Weetabix. Most popular{packed lunches}were ham & cheese sandwiches,chocolate bars and a blackcurrant drink.
We carried out a survey in Bishopton about{"take-away foods",} fish & chips was the most popular with chinese food coming second.
